name: The Medicine Man
overview: An action game from Bob Carr of Magic Carpet Software, released in 1982. The medicine man has overdone it again, and the village is threatened by flood. In panic the elders call upon 'Copecoee' the ancient god of energy. Control Copecoee with the CRS control keys. (lower right corner of key board) Release his energy rays with the shift key scoring 10 points for each rain drop you destroy and 20 points for each snowflake.
